Package fi.abo.kogni.soile2.projecthandling.projectElements.impl

Class Project

java.lang.Object
fi.abo.kogni.soile2.projecthandling.projectElements.ElementBase
fi.abo.kogni.soile2.projecthandling.projectElements.impl.Project
All Implemented Interfaces:
AccessElement, Element
public class Project extends ElementBase
This class represents a Project as stored in the mongoDB Project Database. It essentially represents the Json object represented in the Database.
Author:
Thomas Pfau

      public io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject getUpdates()
      Description copied from class: ElementBase

      Specified by:
